languages.text: {n}Бесстрастный голос наполняется сталью.{/n} "Жалость к сопутствующим жертвам — это слабость, которой еретики успешно пользуются. Пока вы сомневаетесь, враг занимает позиции и восстанавливает силы. Промедление, продиктованное милосердием, только увеличивает ущерб миру".

{n}The Arbitrator's voice rings with steel:{/n} "Aversion to collateral damage is a weakness that heretics exploit to the fullest. While you stand here pitying and hesitating, the enemy is busy fortifying their positions and replenishing their losses. Stalling dictated by mercy only magnifies the damage the world will suffer."
languages.original_text: {n}Бесстрастный голос наполняется сталью.{/n} "Жалость к сопутствующим жертвам — это слабость, которой еретики успешно пользуются. Пока вы сомневаетесь, враг занимает позиции и восстанавливает силы. Промедление, продиктованное милосердием, только увеличивает ущерб миру".

While you stand here pitying and hesitating, the enemy is fortifying its positions and replenishing the losses. Stalling dictated by mercy only magnifies the damage to the world."

While you stand here pitying and hesitating, the enemy is busy fortifying their positions and replenishing their losses. Stalling dictated by mercy only magnifies the damage the world will suffer."

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Arbitrators ist hart wie Stahl:{/n} "Die Abneigung gegen Kollateralschäden ist eine Schwäche, die Ketzer zu nutzen wissen. Während Ihr hier zaudert und zögert, befestigt der Feind seine Positionen und ersetzt seine Verluste. Jedes durch Gnade bedingte Zögern vervielfacht den Schaden, den Eure Welt erleiden wird."
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator's voice rings with steel:{/n} "Aversion to collateral damage is a weakness that heretics exploit to the fullest. While you stand here pitying and hesitating, the enemy is busy fortifying their positions and replenishing their losses. Stalling dictated by mercy only magnifies the damage the world will suffer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Arbitrators ist hart wie Stahl:{/n} "Die Abneigung gegen Kollateralschäden ist eine Schwäche, die Ketzer zu nutzen wissen. Während Ihr hier zaudert und zögert, befestigt der Feind seine Positionen und ersetzt seine Verluste. Jedes durch Gnade bedingte Zögern vervielfacht den Schaden, den Eure Welt erleiden wird."

languages.text: {n}La voix de l'arbitrator se fait tranchante comme l'acier.{/n} « L'aversion aux dégâts collatéraux est une faiblesse que les hérétiques savent exploiter pleinement. L'ennemi consolide ses positions et reprend des forces pendant que vous vous apitoyez et que vous hésitez. Vos tergiversations dictées par la miséricorde ne feront qu'aggraver les dégâts que ce monde subira. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator's voice rings with steel:{/n} "Aversion to collateral damage is a weakness that heretics exploit to the fullest. While you stand here pitying and hesitating, the enemy is busy fortifying their positions and replenishing their losses. Stalling dictated by mercy only magnifies the damage the world will suffer."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de l'arbitrator se fait tranchante comme l'acier.{/n} « L'aversion aux dégâts collatéraux est une faiblesse que les hérétiques savent exploiter pleinement. L'ennemi consolide ses positions et reprend des forces pendant que vous vous apitoyez et que vous hésitez. Vos tergiversations dictées par la miséricorde ne feront qu'aggraver les dégâts que ce monde subira. »

languages.text: {n}La voz del Arbitrator resuena con un tono acerado:{/n} «La aversión a los daños colaterales es una debilidad que los herejes saben explotar. Mientras la compasión le hace dudar, el enemigo no pierde el tiempo fortificando sus posiciones y recuperándose de sus bajas. La demora que conlleva la misericordia no hace más que agravar el daño que sufrirá este planeta».
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator's voice rings with steel:{/n} "Aversion to collateral damage is a weakness that heretics exploit to the fullest. While you stand here pitying and hesitating, the enemy is busy fortifying their positions and replenishing their losses. Stalling dictated by mercy only magnifies the damage the world will suffer."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del Arbitrator resuena con un tono acerado:{/n} «La aversión a los daños colaterales es una debilidad que los herejes saben explotar. Mientras la compasión le hace dudar, el enemigo no pierde el tiempo fortificando sus posiciones y recuperándose de sus bajas. La demora que conlleva la misericordia no hace más que agravar el daño que sufrirá este planeta».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的声音冷硬如钢。{/n}“有的统治者不愿造成附带损害，这正是异端分子最喜欢利用的弱点。当你站在这里同情人民、举棋不定的时候，敌人却在忙着加固阵地，吸纳新的成员。如果因为仁慈而殆误战机，只会让这个世界遭受更加严重的伤害。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator's voice rings with steel:{/n} "Aversion to collateral damage is a weakness that heretics exploit to the fullest. While you stand here pitying and hesitating, the enemy is busy fortifying their positions and replenishing their losses. Stalling dictated by mercy only magnifies the damage the world will suffer."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的声音冷硬如钢。{/n}“有的统治者不愿造成附带损害，这正是异端分子最喜欢利用的弱点。当你站在这里同情人民、举棋不定的时候，敌人却在忙着加固阵地，吸纳新的成员。如果因为仁慈而殆误战机，只会让这个世界遭受更加严重的伤害。”

languages.text: {n}アービトレイターの声が鋼のように響いた。{/n}「巻き添えの被害を避けることは、異端者が最大限に利用する弱点となります。あなたがここで躊躇している間に、敵は陣地を固め、失った戦力を補充しています。慈悲からくるためらいは、惑星が受ける被害を増やすだけです」
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator's voice rings with steel:{/n} "Aversion to collateral damage is a weakness that heretics exploit to the fullest. While you stand here pitying and hesitating, the enemy is busy fortifying their positions and replenishing their losses. Stalling dictated by mercy only magnifies the damage the world will suffer."

traits.locale_text: {n}アービトレイターの声が鋼のように響いた。{/n}「巻き添えの被害を避けることは、異端者が最大限に利用する弱点となります。あなたがここで躊躇している間に、敵は陣地を固め、失った戦力を補充しています。慈悲からくるためらいは、惑星が受ける被害を増やすだけです」

languages.text: {n}Yargıcı'nın sesi çelik gibi çınlıyor.{/n} "Sivil zayiattan kaçınma eğilimi, kâfirlerin son damlasına kadar suistimal ettiği bir zayıflıktır. Siz burada öylece insanlara acıyıp tereddüde düşerken düşman, canla başla çalışıp konumlarının tahkimini ve kayıplarının tazminini sağlamakla meşgul. Merhamet duygusuyla oyalandıkça dünya daha büyük zarar görecek."
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator's voice rings with steel:{/n} "Aversion to collateral damage is a weakness that heretics exploit to the fullest. While you stand here pitying and hesitating, the enemy is busy fortifying their positions and replenishing their losses. Stalling dictated by mercy only magnifies the damage the world will suffer."
